subject: Concurrent runner for Junit 4
msgSnippet: I know it s been asked a couple of times, but it never seems to have been answered very clearly.  Is there a way to run tests concurrently in Junit 4 like we
messageBody:
I know it's been asked a couple of times, but it never seems to have
been answered very clearly. Is there a way to run tests concurrently
in Junit 4 like we used to be able to with ActiveTestSuite in Junit 3?
